overview:
Kyrah Ayers (aka Lyrical Profet) is a Spoken Word Artist, Event Host and Music Lyric Writer.

Kyrah is the founder and host of “Poetry By The Bay”, the largest Open Mic Poetry venue in Vallejo, CA. Poetry By The Bay is a free event every second and fourth Thursday of the month that takes place at Panama Red Coffee Co. Kyrah has also been featured at a variety of Bay Area events and been the judge for Spoken Word youth competitive events.

With a Communications degree from Fresno State and years of experience, Kyrah has become a professional host or MC. He’s introduced government officials, big name artists and hosted at a variety of Bay Area venues.

Kyrah Ayers is the owner of ProfeticLyrics which focuses on the importance of lyrical content in music. As a long time writer, Kyrah’s had the opportunity to work with a variety of local artists of different genres of music. In the coming years, we hope to grow ProfeticLyrics to a Nationally known name.
